plugin_manifest.name: Bootstrap Multi file Upload
plugin_manifest.author: Government of Canada
plugin_manifest.description: Adds multi-file upload form with Bootstrap drag and drop file upload. Requires Bootstrap framework to display/function correctly. If your website does not use Bootstrap you can enable a modified version of Bootstrap to be loaded in plugin settings. Sourced from: http://plugins.krajee.com/file-input
